game.name: Blueprint Tycoon
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Build your settlement, gather goods, ensure maximum efficiency and make a profit!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Build your settlement, gather goods, ensure maximum efficiency and make a profit!

reviewHighlights.text: Blueprint Tycoon, developed and published by Endless Loop Studios, is an economic management and logistics simulation that takes a minimalist approach...
Blueprint Tycoon touch me in places even my uncle couldn't reach.
